subject: Re: UI tests in Eclipse on MAC

messageBody:
Just as a followup for everyone on this...

One issue seems to be that FEST handles certain things differently on OSX. For example, we use customized JButtons in the toolbar to display drop-down menus, which works fine with FEST on Windows but there's this little extra part for Mac...

@RunsInEDT
private void doClick(JMenuItem menuItem) {
if (isMacOSMenuBar()) {
validateAndDoClick(menuItem);
return;
}
super.click(menuItem);
robot.waitForIdle();
}

which eventually results in an endless loop as FEST attempts to walk the component tree looking for a JMenu/Item parent - which it never finds in the case of our JButtons.
